languages.text: "Я слышала лишь о том, как проклятый мясник из рода ксеносов хвастался очередным краденным солнцем. Истина это или очередная ложь врагов Неумирающего? Мне неизвестно".
languages.translation_comment: какую еще полезную инфу мы можем выдать игроку?
какую еще полезную инфу мы можем выдать игроку?

languages.text: "All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."
languages.original_text: "Я слышала лишь о том, как проклятый мясник из рода ксеносов хвастался очередным краденным солнцем. Истина это или очередная ложь врагов Неумирающего? Мне неизвестно".

traits.locale_text: "All I heard was the blasted xenos butcher boasting about having stolen another sun. Was it truth or just another lie of the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."
"All I heard was the blasted xenos butcher boasting about having stolen another sun. Was it truth or just another lie of the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."
"All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."
"All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."
"All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."
"All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."

languages.text: «Lo único que oí fue a ese malhadado carnicero xenos jactándose de que habían robado otro sol. ¿Decía la verdad, o no era más que otro embuste pergeñado por los enemigos del Inmortal? Eso lo ignoro».
languages.original_text: "All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."

traits.locale_text: «Lo único que oí fue a ese malhadado carnicero xenos jactándose de que habían robado otro sol. ¿Decía la verdad, o no era más que otro embuste pergeñado por los enemigos del Inmortal? Eso lo ignoro».

languages.text: 「私が聞いたのは、あの呪われた異種族の屠殺人が、また太陽を盗んだという自慢話だけ。それが本当なのか、またしても不死の者の敵がついた嘘なのか。私にはわからないわ」
languages.original_text: "All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."

traits.locale_text: 「私が聞いたのは、あの呪われた異種族の屠殺人が、また太陽を盗んだという自慢話だけ。それが本当なのか、またしても不死の者の敵がついた嘘なのか。私にはわからないわ」

languages.text: “我只听到那个该死的异形屠夫吹嘘，说他们又窃取了一颗恒星。这是真的吗？还是说，这又是不死之神的敌人编造的谎言？我也不清楚。”
languages.original_text: "All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."

traits.locale_text: “我只听到那个该死的异形屠夫吹嘘，说他们又窃取了一颗恒星。这是真的吗？还是说，这又是不死之神的敌人编造的谎言？我也不清楚。”

languages.text: "Ich habe nur gehört, wie der verfluchte Xenos-Schlächter mit einer weiteren gestohlenen Sonne geprahlt hat. War das die Wahrheit oder nur eine weitere Lüge der Feinde des Todlosen? Ich weiß es nicht."
languages.original_text: "All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nur gehört, wie der verfluchte Xenos-Schlächter mit einer weiteren gestohlenen Sonne geprahlt hat. War das die Wahrheit oder nur eine weitere Lüge der Feinde des Todlosen? Ich weiß es nicht."

languages.text: « Tout ce que j'ai entendu, c'est ce maudit boucher xénos qui pérorait à propos d'un autre soleil volé. Était-ce la vérité ou un énième mensonge monté de toutes pièces par les ennemis de l'Immortel ? Je l'ignore. »
languages.original_text: "All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce que j'ai entendu, c'est ce maudit boucher xénos qui pérorait à propos d'un autre soleil volé. Était-ce la vérité ou un énième mensonge monté de toutes pièces par les ennemis de l'Immortel ? Je l'ignore. »

languages.original_text: "All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."

languages.text: "Soyu kuruyasıca zeno kasabının bir güneş daha çalmışlar diye böbürlenmesi dışında hiçbir şey duyamadım. Gerçek miydi yoksa Ölmeyen'in düşmanlarının uydurduğu bir başka yalan mı? Bunu bilemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "All I heard was that accursed xenos butcher boasting about another stolen sun. Was it the truth, or was it just another lie told by the Undying One's enemies? I do not know."
